title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the LLMTuner tool, including the specific use cases, target domains, desired features, integration points with existing systems, data sources, security and privacy considerations, scalability and performance requirements, and any other relevant constraints or assumptions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for LLMTuner, including the components, data flow, and interactions between modules.

title: Develop Data Preparation Pipeline
description: Implement the data preparation pipeline for cleaning, formatting, and preprocessing data for fine-tuning the large language models.

title: Implement Model Training and Optimization
description: Develop the core functionality for fine-tuning and optimizing large language models, including model loading, training loop, and hyperparameter tuning.

title: Build Performance Evaluation Module
description: Create a module for evaluating the performance of fine-tuned models, including metrics calculation, model comparison, and result visualization.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for interacting with LLMTuner, including data management, training configuration, and result analysis.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Develop security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure data privacy and secure model fine-tuning and deployment.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of LLMTuner to various environments.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for LLMTuner, covering installation, usage, and advanced features.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute thorough testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of LLMTuner.
